text: (gentle music)

- [Narrator] In the digital
landscape, security is key.
And some of the most important assets
to protect are your digital secrets,

like database credentials,
API keys, and tokens.

AWS Secrets Manager helps you
protect the secrets needed

to access your applications,
services, and IT resources.

It simplifies and
strengthens your security,
allowing you to manage,

rotate, and retrieve
your secrets at scale.

Use Secrets Manager to
manage the life cycle
of secrets and integrate

with other AWS services
to automate monitoring,
and quickly identify secrets that do not

meet internal security or
compliance requirements.
It's designed to work in lockstep
with AWS Identity and Access Management,
simplifying how you follow the principle

of least privilege with the
right access control policies.
You can enable integrated rotation
for AWS database services,
which can be automated without redeploying
or disrupting active applications
to help meet your organizational security
and compliance requirements.

Secrets Manager allows
you to replicate secrets
to support multi-region applications
and disaster recovery scenarios.
This can strengthen your cyber resilience,
and streamlines access when you need it.
Stay on top of your security

by getting started today
with AWS Secrets Manager.
